title: Pizza and Pretty in Pink: Celebration at TREVI Italian Restaurant
text:
TREVI Italian Restaurant inside The Forum Shops at Caesars "outdoor" patio Photo courtesy of TREVI Italian Restaurant TREVI Italian Restaurant inside The Forum Shops at Caesars is celebrating National Pizza Month and Breast Cancer Awareness Month in October.
Executive Chef Peter Scaturro, who has been at Trevi for over 20 years, has created pizza specials inspired by his Italian heritage. With his trip to Italy as a culinary delight and learning experience, he combines traditional Italian cuisine with an American flair.
Specialty pizzas will be offered for $10 each day throughout the month. Some of Chef Scaturro’s pizza specials will include Italian sausage made with peppers, roasted garlic and mozzarella; Margherita made with Roma tomatoes, mozzarella and fresh basil; Herb Roasted Chicken made with roasted garlic, caramelized onions, roasted tomatoes and goat cheese and Pepperoni with fresh mozzarella.
TREVI has also teamed up with Susan G. Komen of Southern Nevada to create a ‘Pretty In Pink’ menu during October.
The ‘Pretty In Pink’ menu includes hand-crafted Italian sodas in watermelon, cherry and strawberry, priced at $5 each and strawberry gelato starting at $6.50 a scoop. Ten percent of proceeds from each sale will be donated back to Susan G. Komen of Southern Nevada.
Trevi, located next to the Fountain of the Gods at The Forum Shops at Caesars, features homemade traditional and contemporary Italian cuisine including pasta, chicken and veal for lunch, dinner, group dining and cocktails. When dining at Trevi, seating includes an "outdoor" patio café with a chance to people watch. Within the restaurant, there is the Mezzanine level overlooking the fountain and piazzas, a 28-seat oval bar and walk up gelato/coffee bar. Trevi Time, its version of Happy Hour, includes half priced mixed drinks, beer and wine by the glass and a Trevi Bites special menu.
The restaurant and bar is open daily for lunch and dinner Sunday through Thursday 11 a.m. until 11 p.m. and Friday and Saturday 11 a.m. until midnight. More information and reservations are available at www.trevi-italian.com or call 702.735.4663.
